titles.title: A bill to amend the Controlled Substances Act to list isotonitazene as a schedule I controlled substance.
A bill to amend the Controlled Substances Act to list isotonitazene as a schedule I controlled substance.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: This bill adds certain synthetic opioids to schedule I of the Controlled Substances Act. (A schedule I controlled substance is a drug, substance, or chemical that has a high potential for abuse; has no currently accepted medical value; and is subject to regulatory controls and administrative, civil, and criminal penalties under the Controlled Substances Act.)
